channel.title: CVE Feed for IDEC Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IDEC Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-41927|2024-09-04T13:59:57.911Z -- idec%20corporation -- fc6a%20series%20microsmart%20all-in-one%20cpu%20module
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability exists in multiple IDEC PLCs. If an attacker sends a specific command to PLC's serial communication port, user credentials may be obtained. As a result, the program of the PLC may be obtained, and the PLC may be manipulated.

item.title: CVE-2024-41716|2024-09-04T13:59:04.280Z -- idec%20corporation -- windldr
item.description: Cleartext storage of sensitive information vulnerability exists in WindLDR and WindO/I-NV4. If this vulnerability is exploited, an attacker who obtained the product's project file may obtain user credentials of the PLC or Operator Interfaces. As a result, an attacker may be able to manipulate and/or suspend the PLC and Operator Interfaces by accessing or hijacking them.

item.title: CVE-2024-41927|2024-09-04T00:43:55.555Z -- idec%20corporation -- fc6a%20series%20microsmart%20all-in-one%20cpu%20module
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability exists in multiple IDEC PLCs. If an attacker sends a specific command to PLC's serial communication port, user credentials may be obtained. As a result, the program of the PLC may be obtained, and the PLC may be manipulated.
